pros: Clinicas is mission driven. They serve patients in need. It is fast paced but very good support from your peers. Recently we all have got raises which is great given the inflation. Management is working hard to keep us all informed of the changes and good things are happening. I see lot of growth opportunities.
cons: It is a big company and some of my peers have their own problems and try to push it on everyone. The company is very nice. I like where I work.

job_title: Chief Financial Officer (CFO) in Camarillo, CA
pros: 21st Century cutting edge approach to healthcare that puts patient care front and center, values, recognizes, and rewards those who are willing to roll up their sleeves and do the work necessary to fulfill Clinicas mission and propel it toward its envisioned future on the wheels of its core values. We are an organization that values pragmatic and forward-thinking ideas, acts on them, and lets you see the results for yourself. There's much to gain by joining this team.
cons: We may not be perfect, but will continue the never-ending work of getting closer to it every day.

review_title: As honest as I can get
pros: Pension benefits were nice, but you have to stay at least 8 years to be completely vested Vacation time is generous
cons: Management is lacking in understanding the culture that has been created. They want you to take call for a whole week, 24 hours each day for a nominal fee of $3/hour They want you to work on weekends They want you to stay after hours Not enough time to chart and see the amount of patients they want you to see.

pros: Clinicas is mission driven and a great company to work for! It is Patient centered and is invested in its core values. Patients are appreciative of the services! Company provides a great work life balance. Hard working employees are valued. Employees work hard and strive to provide excellent patient care across the board. I am very fortunate to be working with some of the most amazing people I have met in my 20 plus years of professional career.
cons: Changes are coming for better future!

pros: 12 paid holidays no weekends
cons: Low pay, PTO accrues slowly.

pros: They will give you a job because they are desperate.
cons: Mediocre health care system. They take advantage of low income families including there employees that’s why they only hire Latino because they know they can pay them minimum wage and get away with it. Only minorities get hired here because they will settle with working hard while getting paid little to nothing. Clinicas currently has to pay the federal government millions of dollars back due to fraud, if they are willing to do that to the government imagine what they will do to scam an employee. (This is not confidential information- it is available via google)

pros: All employees at this company are there to truly serve the mission of helping the under served. They care for their employees and offer great benefits.
cons: Minimum flexibility with work hours, but this seems to be changing.

review_title: Great benefits, but no personal life
pros: You have Great benefits , awesome holiday bonuses, paid time off , consistent pay and wages with room for raises
cons: You Cannot take time off if you don’t have time accrued. Other jobs would allow you to take the time off without pay. In case of an emergency unplanned trip, They do not allow this. Even if it’s a planned trip, they are so short staffed months in advance you most likely will not get that time approved

pros:
You get to make a difference in the under-privilege community.
There is a lot of diversity, racially and culturally, which is incredibly important these days.
cons: Pay is on the lower end, which is understandable should increase it regardless because living in Ventura Country is costly.

job_title: Patient Service Representative in Oxnard, CA
pros: Work Schedule fits my personal life needs
cons: Not fully staffed company wide

review_title: Great place to start your health care career
job_title: Call Center Representative in Camarillo, CA
pros: great training, flexibility and keeps you busy all day. Also has great benefits and chance for growth.
cons: The only reason why I left is the compensation. Everything else was great but need to work to be more competitive with local companies in the same industry.

pros: You gain experience so that’s good
cons: Hard to get time off and the turn over is bad due to lack of pay

job_title: Front Desk Receptionist in Ventura, CA
pros: Paid vacation and medical insurance
cons: Work load for what you get paid

pros: Colleagues are collaborative and supportive.
cons: The company does not match on the 403b retirement plan,

pros: Good patient connection, well managed referral center, good working hours
cons: The office managers are sometimes very dominating and dictate your work and schedules.

pros: Great people, hours, great work environment and salary
cons: nothing loved everything no cons

pros: Some truthful employees close to home....
cons: Management has no clue what they are doing. There is no unity, values, or recognition of hard working employees. Due to at will employment you can be fired for no good reason. Then they try to deny your unemployment. But when you go to court and fight it and the judge is trying to control his laughter for the reasons they give for letting you go and telling you to go back and speak with the human resources director it helps to confirm that management has no idea what they are doing. And neither does the company because they don't get involved with the everyday employees. So many people warmed me about the person that became my supervisor it hard to believe the administration doesn't know what everyone is saying about her.

review_title: Place to learn and be part of community. Don't apply if you're afraid to roll up your sleeves.
pros: Clinicas is growing and gives opportunities to learn new concepts in healthcare.  Before Clinicas, I didn't know many people that have worked in the same company for many years. It's nice to feel that I can expand my CAREER with Clinicas. It doesn't have to be just a job.
cons: Many of the available positions at Clinicas are entry level jobs that attract people with very little or no experience.  The company is growing so much and they struggle to keep up with demand.

pros: Good place to go get experiencia, very busy pace never boring you meet a lot of people decent benefits for employee only.
cons:
This company wants people that follows  the crow no iniciative is appreciate. Patients wait in the lobby for hours all they care about is money, every clinic has a spy that tells on employees
managers call you to the office and ask what everybody is doing. They float you a lot, change the schedule any time and don't care about your family or personal life.

pros: The company tends to hire and give priority to family members and friends of upper management and board members. Great place to be related. lots of opportunities! great compensation (even better than your more qualified coworkers)
cons: nepotism is rampant. sons, daughters, nieces, nephews, cousins, and spouses are everywhere. some are hired  without merit or without qualifications.(some don't even speak English or even citizens). this may hinder patients quality of care. they are usually held at a different standard. thou not illegal this demonstrateherhe core ethics of management. every department has abused this privilege at one time or another. this may also affect company and coworker moral. unfortunately turnover and retention is poor.

pros: I have been working at Clinicas del Camino Real for the past 8 years. I love the environment, the employees, Clinicas gives you the opportunity to grow, pay for your school,  learn different departments. Great benefits (Vacations, sick days, Holidays, Bonus at the end of the year) not all company's offer those benefits.
cons: I don't have any Cons at the moment

pros:
- Opportunities for advancement
- Encourages personal growth and provides educational assistance
- Competitive pay
- Feels like 2nd family
- Good benefits package, especially if visiting Clinicas providers
- Staff at clinics are friendly and will make sure you feel welcomed
cons: If you are not looking for a place to give back to the community and make a difference, rather than just looking for a really good paying job, this may not be the place for you.

pros: Salary, staff, benefits, recruiting support. Thorough orientation.  Mission statement compassionate , services tailored for particular population.  Clinic settings pleasant and accessible.
cons: Long hours with inconsistent 1 break. Inflexible top heavy management attitude.  Constant changes, hard to keep up.  Input from staff not acknowledged.

pros: There are caring staff members that hold on for dear life.
cons: Ridiculous management who run the place as if it is a military school. If you are a professional, steer very clear of this place. They have lost sight of the fact that the billing employees keep the lights on and pay their salaries. It is management-centric and poorly administrated. BEWARE!

pros: I love Clinicas and I believe in the work we do. I have been an employee of Clinicas  for over 5 years in many different positions within the company. The staff are very friendly and hard working.
cons: The pay is not good. If you do the same amount of work anywhere else they pay way better hence why a lot of employees go to CMH or St Johns.

review_title: Great Growing Company with Opportunities to grow
pros: I have been with Clinicas for 4 years and I have grown so much already. Clinicas has given me such remarkable chances to grow with in the company and they have even payed for me to continue my education! Very family oriented and they always put their workers first
cons: A bit under payed however; the pros outlook the cons

pros: Safe place to work, stable work , excellent work hours,  Work life balance. Our manager pushes us to not only work hard but have our own personal goals.  CEO cares about the employees. We are not just numbers
cons: No place is perfect but at this time I don't have anything negative to say.

pros: Helping the poor.  Can not say anything positive for a group which mistreats employees.  Runs medical practices like a Costco warehouse.
cons: Not being allowed to practice medicine with out management interference.  Changes doctors orders without doctors permission. Having high school drop outs giving medical advice in contradiction to medical doctors.

pros: I've been working for Clinicas' over 5 years. Love that Clinicas’ supports education, trainings, and growth in general. Clinicas’ provides different employee incentives, such as bonuses, employee/family events, and more. Love Clinicas’ and their mission.
cons: There is nothing negative to report. Clinicas' is an excellent employer.

pros: Some employees actually WANT to do the right thing however management is crooked and unethical making it impossible for fear of getting fired.
cons: Upper management and management are comprised of a lot of unethical people. Clinicas is supposed to be non-profit organization but all they are care about is making money regardless of how they do it.

pros: Friendly environment, great training, good benefits, & great opportunities to advance (career and as a professional)
cons: I Can't think of one...

review_title: Good environment to learn and grow.
pros: Great staff to work with, room for growth, and always learning new things.
cons: I have no downsides of working at Clinicas.

pros:
Great learning opportunities for Information Technology individuals
Good working schedule
Great benefits
cons: I don't have an cons at this particular time.

job_title: Customer Service Specialist in Camarillo, CA
pros: Great company to work for. Treats employees very fair. Great work environment
cons: There are none at this time

pros: It is a patient centered company. They provide amazing care to the under served population of Ventura county
cons: Limited specialist within the company

pros: Some good people on the front lines
cons: Terrible upper management, cannot get advanced unless you are friends or family with a chief. Poor pay, poor benefits, not patient centered or focused. Unsupportive and disorganized management.

job_title: Med Assistant Back Ofie in Ojai, CA
pros: PTO/Sick time/ Life Ins./ Benefits
cons: They tend to focus on numbers more then anything

pros: good company to work for
cons: all locations only in ventura county
